items.sentence: What kind of woman could love a guy like Tom?
Perhaps we should find out what Tom\'s doing.
I ate lunch with my friends in the cafeteria.
I heard some people singing Christmas carols.
Tom seems to speak French better than before.
Tom tricked Mary into doing his work for him.
Tom lived in Australia for quite a few years.
Tom didn\'t understand what the teacher said.
Tom didn\'t want Mary to think he was a fool.
Kids are getting hurt playing contact sports.
Let me find somewhere to put these suitcases.
I\'m sorry I\'m late. It won\'t happen again.
Tom needs to be told he should wear a helmet.
Tom needs to get to the hospital immediately.
Tom often goes to the supermarket by bicycle.
Tom and Mary are junior high school students.
Tom and Mary became dependent on one another.
Tom and Mary both look worried and exhausted.
Tom never did learn how to do that correctly.
Tom reads more books than anyone else I know.
